note.p: Fuegian. Grandson of Orundellico (Jemmy Button). Orphaned at the age of 8. Lived at the orphanage established by the South American Mission Society at Ushuaia in the Beagle Channel, Patagonia. Renamed William Beckenham when support was provided for him by the Beckenham and Shortlands Association.
South American Missionary Magazine, 1 March 1877, p. 76; 1 February 1878, p. 32; 1 October 1879, p. 223
